summary: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.
cast: William Holden|Alec Guinness|Jack Hawkins|Sessue Hayakawa|James Donald|Geoffrey Horne|André Morell|Peter Williams|John Boxer|Percy Herbert|Harold Goodwin|Ann Sears|Heihachirô Ôkawa|Keiichirô Katsumoto|M.R.B. Chakrabandhu|Vilaiwan Seeboonreaung|Ngamta Suphaphongs|Javanart Punynchoti|Kannikar Dowklee|Tsai Chin|Christopher Greet|Herbert Nelson
title: El puente sobre el río Kwai
